column5: Milne MicroDried’s organic fruit and vegetable ingredients are ideal for today’s plant-based era and vegan applications. Offering great natural taste, rich color and a clean label, MicroDried offers over 40 dried fruit and vegetable varieties including 17 organic products – all made with no added sugars, color or preservatives of any kind.    From apples to zucchini, MicroDried offers traditional to exotic dried fruit ingredients – blueberry and cherry to mango and pomegranate - and sweet to savory dried vegetables – sweet potatoes to kale and bell pepper.  These ingredients are high in dietary fiber, protein, vitamins and antioxidants, are naturally low in fat, sodium and cholesterol and are Non-GMO, gluten and allergen free.    These ingredients are available in organic and traditional powders, fragments and whole pieces that can be right-sized for a wide variety applications.  In addition, the moisture level, water activity and the texture can be controlled to meet customer specifications for consumer products.  Depending on the characteristics of the raw fruit or vegetable, most varieties are available in both chewy and crunchy textures.  MicroDried prides itself in meeting the industry’s strict quality and certification standards and is certified each year by AIB, BRC, the Orthodox Union (Kosher) and the Washington State Department of Agriculture in accordance with USDA organic regulations.  All ingredient products are made in the USA and are certified Ready-To-Eat.
column6: Brands: Milne MicroDried produces a wide variety of healthy, clean-label dried fruit and vegetable ingredients for food and beverage manufacturers world-wide.  We are committed to the highest domestic & international safety standards in the industry.

We are a Japanese manufacturer of processed oils and fats with a 102-year history. With the technology we have accumulated over the years, we have been able to reproduce the taste of animal fats and oils on a plant basis and named it "botanova."  Animal fats are masters at enhancing the flavor of food, and botanova is a plant-based version of that mastery, making it the plant-based food solution. Use our botanova fats as a solution to make your plant-based food tastier.
column6: Brands: The botanova lineup includes four flavors: butter, lard, beef tallow, and chicken. Replace your "regular" vegetable oils with botanova that has impressed Japanese artisans who are fussy about taste.  You'll be amazed at the dramatic change in taste.

Our vision is a healthier world in which humans view physical and mental wellbeing as the truest measures of wealth. A healthy world is a harmonious one, and the substantial role food plays is undeniable. When you eat well, you feel well. And when you feel well, you do well.

Mutual Trading continues to generate cross-cultural understanding through foods, promoting Japanese culinary art along with its health benefits for the worldwide market.
